column4: hello world, I installed the new ubuntu the first time from scratch on a box in our network and I'm really gonna puke now: a) Why was GParted removec from the setup?? b) Why was XChat removed from the std installation? c) Why in hell wasn't I promted to enter a root password during installation?! What happened to ubuntu :(
Now I'm sitting here without any root password wtf?
dont worry the root password tripped me out too, i just reset it
